biotools.summary: An integrated online platform developed for the screening and prediction of potential frequent drug hitters, thus improving the efficiency of drug R&D in colloidal aggregate, firefly luciferase reporter enzyme inhibition, fluorescence, chemical reactivity, and promiscuity. ChemFH: an integrated tool for screening frequent false positives in chemical biology and drug discovery.
